article: egyptian mediators pushed the militant palestinian hamas group to accept a truce proposal for the embattled gaza strip in talks tuesday , while the u.n. secretary-general headed to the region to join the unk diplomatic efforts for a cease-fire .
abstract: egypt in more talks with hamas

the truce would see the group withdraw from the embattled gaza strip.
